page.title: 10My Special Day
page.content: My special day was when I had my fishing licence when we went to Chester. I got a licence for the River Dee and I felt very excited. We went in a fishing shop. I also bought a box and some maggots, two floats, a bag of weights, hooks and a line. I felt very pleased and I love fishing. The next day I went fishing in the river and I went at 9.30am but I did not catch anything. I had a trout but it fell off so I kept on trying. At 6 0'clock I went home and had my tea. In the day there were six men fishing but only one man caught a fish and that was an eel. The other men were like me and didn't catch anything. I had spent 8\ hours fishing and caught nothing so I went home, but I hope to catch a salmon when I go again another day.
